mdRecord.dcterms:title: On the Breach by Dunkirk By Otto Engelhardt-Kyffhauser
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
A photograph of a painting that was part of an exhibit titled "MALER AND DER FRONT"
The donor is unknown, however, believed to be past resident of Floyd County that served in WW II
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: World War II
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
